original_title: Persona Music Live -Velvetroom in Akasaka Blitz-
overview: Persona Music Live 2008 -Velvet Room- ~in Akasaka Blitz was a concert held on August 22, 2008. It featured songs from Persona 3, FES, Persona -trinity soul- and Persona 4.
title: Persona Music Live -Velvetroom in Akasaka Blitz-
